listing.listing_description:
Hang your (straw) hat next to the others on hooks by the pool terrace at this casual modern villa perched in the hills above Healdsburg. Gull-gray siding gives the home a Cape Cod vibe, while vaulted ceilings, mid-century-inspired furniture, mountain views, and an EV charger bring in California cool. Find a handmade decanter to remember your stay at a boutique in Healdsburg Plaza, 8 minutes away.

The mountain views open up before outdoor living spaces with lounging and dining furniture, a barbecue, and a swimming pool and hot tub that are heated from May to September. If you’ve spent the day outside cycling or hiking, retreat to a games room with pool and foosball tables, a wood-burning fireplace, Wi-Fi, and a smart TV indoors.

Wood and stone finishes bring the landscape inside this vacation rental. A vaulted wood-paneled ceiling stretches over the living area, dining area, fully equipped kitchen, and breakfast nook in the great room, while hardwood floors underfoot tie the areas together. Thoughtful details like skylight-style windows in the kitchen bring the views inside, too.

This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. The third bedroom has a queen bed and shares access to a hall bathroom. All three bedrooms have private balconies.

The villa is an 8-minute drive from Healdsburg Plaza, whose 19th-century buildings are now home to boutiques, bistros, and vineyard shops where you can spend a holiday afternoon wine-tasting. Stop by the museum to learn about local family history, book a cooking class, and sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner—with wine pairings, of course—at an Italian restaurant. You’re also close enough to the Bouverie Wildflower Preserve, Sonoma Plaza, and the beach at Sonoma Coast State Park for a day trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Originally a mining cabin, this recently re-built five bedroom is just three blocks from downtown Breckenridge, making it easy to hit the town, and the slopes, whenever you please. Harris House is luxuriously equipped to accommodate up to fourteen guests and is an ideal home base for a multi-family ski vacation. Within walking distance, you’ll find dining, boutique shops, a movie theatre, library, and Free Skier bus stop, which offers quick and easy access to Breckenridge’s most popular ski destinations.

Wood, stone, and mountain-view framing glass make up the building materials of Harris House, displaying all the tropes of traditional alpine design. This house, however, has a modern spin, thanks to its sleek and stylish take on the classic atmosphere. High-end electronics, plush seating, and state of the appliances decorate the living spaces. The open concept layout and vaulted ceilings add to Harris House’s spacious feel, while the soaring mountain views add an exclamation point.

Harris House is outfitted with a fully equipped modern kitchen with a dishwasher, ice maker, and wine fridge, and there’s a barbecue on the terrace. The formal dining area has seating for ten, with extra space at the kitchen’s breakfast bar and the wet bar. Outside, the hot tub is a perfect place to warm up after a day of skiing, or you could do it the old-fashioned way and light up the fire pit.

The nearest ski access points to Harris House are Peak 10, Breckenridge Ski Resort, and Copper Mountain; all are within a few minutes drive. After you’ve spent a day on the mountain, reward yourself with a night in town, which is just a five-minute walk from home. Once downtown, you’ll find a wide range of dining options, from the fine cuisine at Hearthstone, to the great craft beer selection at The Canteen, you’re sure to find something that suits your mood. After dinner, check the local listings for live music or stop in for one of the latest releases at the Speakeasy Movie Theatre.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fun is the goal at this sports-obsessed villa in the Reunion resort community in Orlando. Its red-tiled roof and stone accents have the same Mediterranean charm as the other homes on its quiet cul-de-sac, but inside, it boasts the area’s first synthetic ice rink. To keep playtime going at the theme parks, drive 9 miles to Disney World and 20 miles to Universal Studios.

Soak up the Florida sunshine on a backyard patio with a swimming pool surrounded by loungers, a hot tub, and firepit, and seek shade in a covered living and dining area with a barbecue. Score goals on the ice rink, practice your swing at more than 40 famous courses in the golf simulator, and rack up points on the arcade games. If you need to unwind after a day of theme parks, host a family movie night in the home theater.

The villa’s playful side is balanced by a practical one, which is on display in the L-shaped great room. There’s a spacious sectional in the living area on one side, seating for 14 around the dining table on the other, and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen in the middle.

It’s less than 10 minutes from the villa to the water park and golf course at the Reunion resort. For even bigger thrills, drive 9 miles to the theme parks at Disney World and 20 miles to Universal Studios.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Two Trails is a wonderful Rocky Mountain chalet in Mountain Village, with ski-in/ski-out access to Upper Sundance Trail at Telluride Ski Resort. The capacious, 6,000-square-foot home is superbly appointed for a contemporary ski vacation, featuring an outdoor hot tub, a sauna, a spacious party room with billiard table, and a cavernous great room with gourmet kitchen and spectacular mountain views. Six superb bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms—including two deluxe king suites and two kid-friendly bunkrooms—offer ideal accommodations for families with children and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.

The home stands majestically amid the pine forests of this serene enclave, enjoying breathtaking views of the San Sophia Mountains and Telluride slopes. The lodge-style great room features a towering stone hearth and gas fireplace, vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams, reclaimed chestnut floors, and a pop-up TV within a lovely cabinet. The open kitchen boasts chef-grade appliances and expansive granite surfaces, and serves an exquisite timber dining table within a luminous, mountain-view niche. Multiple balconies extend from the villa's living areas and bedrooms, beckoning you into the delicious alpine air.

The fabulous downstairs party room includes a billiard table, wet bar, and cozy TV den with fireplace. It opens directly to the hot tub on the deck—perfect for an end-of-day soak. The villa also features central heating, LiteTouch lighting, and a multi-room Sonos sound system.

There are two deluxe king suites among the chalet's six bedrooms, making it an ideal choice for two families. Each features a fireplace, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The four remaining guestrooms include two charming kids' bunkrooms, and all feature ensuite bathrooms. The villa's sauna and steam shower are located in the bathroom adjoining one of the bunkrooms on the lower level, near the ski room.

From the entrance to the ski room, you're just a few steps from Upper Sundance—your gateway to one of the finest ski resorts in the American West. The villa is also just seven miles from the vintage charm and bustling cultural scene of downtown Telluride, as well as Telluride Golf Course. Drive about twelve miles to the beautiful Alta Lake and its famed ghost town.

TMVBL 006884

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Business license ID: 006164

listing.listing_description:
Perched up high along the winding streets of the Hollywood Hills, this luxurious four bedroom shows off the classic style of the silver screen with an updated modern twist, sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Sunset Supreme enjoys an incredibly scenic vista of Los Angeles, reminding you that Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, Malibu, and Hollywood are all just a few minutes away.

Showing pride in its large construction, Sunset Supreme’s exposed steel beams outline the two-story living room, opening the space with floor-to-ceiling glass that captures an incredible view of the city below. This sleek and stylish vacation rental lives up the highest standards of design and decor that are synonymous with the homes of the Hollywood Hills. Thoughtfully positioned atop Sunset’s Oak floors, you’ll find contemporary designer furnishings, high-end electronics, and a beautiful brick fireplace. Throughout the villa’s white, canvas-like walls, you’ll enjoy an extensive collection of modern works of art. And, in the kitchen, you’ll love the functional, extra-wide galley style layout, with state of the art appliances and thick granite countertops.

Inside and out, you’ll enjoy cable televisions, Sonos sound systems, elegant dining areas, and relaxing lounge spaces. On the terrace, the lap pool and hot tub are great spots to enjoy the city view. Back inside, the cozy home theatre is ideal for movie nights with family and friends. And, when it’s time to retire for the evening, all four of Sunset’s bedroom’s come with en-suite bathrooms, and king or queen sized beds.

The sheer amount of World-renowned attractions within fifteen miles of Sunset Supreme is absolutely astounding. If you’re in the mood to shop, Rodeo Drive is the perfect place to spend an afternoon. For nightlife, the Sunset Strip is just down the hill. If you’re traveling with children, Disneyland, Universal Studios, and the Griffith Observatory are great spots for family fun. And, when it’s time to hit the beach, you’ll love the option to compare between Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and Malibu Pier, three of the most vibrant beach communities on the planet.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note there is construction across the street from this property through to Summer 2019. Please ask your Villa Specialist for more details.  

Business License ID: 017900

Make yourself at home in Telluride in the welcoming Town Jewel. As its name suggests, this charming vacation rental is in the heart of town, within walking distance of restaurants, shops and the gondola station. Its four bedrooms can accommodate the whole family on a ski holiday or a group of eight friends on a Colorado getaway.

After a day out in the mountains, prepare dinner on the barbecue. A media room and wet bar make it easy to entertain, while the gas fireplace and Wi-Fi invite you to relax a little.

Town Jewel is laid out around a two-level great room with an open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A sleek gas fireplace is a cozy focal point in the sitting area, and a dining table that seats eight is the perfect place to enjoy the warmth of each other’s company. The media room and wet bar are separate, so the kids can watch one movie while the grown-ups enjoy another.

This luxury property has a master suite with a king bed and honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as a jetted tub and private balcony, as well as one bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms each have a double bunk bed, and all four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

For skiing, make the 2-minute walk to the Telluride gondola station; for après-ski dining, shopping and more, make the 4-minute walk into the town of Telluride. If you’ll be visiting during the summer, plan to tee off in the shadow of the mountains at the nearby Telluride Golf Course or plan an afternoon at the Alta Lakes, where you can snap a few photos of the landscape and visit the ghost town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This breathtaking villa is situated on a serene, one-acre estate along Cypress Avenue in San Diego, a short walk from Balboa Park. Gracefully fusing interior and exterior living spaces, the designer home's amenities include a swimming pool with three in-water cabanas, a voluminous spa, an eight-person Swedish barrel sauna, and a stunning gourmet kitchen. Five bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms comfortably accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size.

The expansive, indoor/outdoor venue is ideal for special occasions, festive entertainment, or intimate relaxation. Savor the Southern California light on king-size sunbeds in the cabanas, before plunging into the sparkling pool. Enjoy alfresco meals in the shade of the veranda, and ascend to the upper balcony for sunset drinks. Linger outdoors in the enchanting nighttime lighting, sipping wine by the fire pit or gathering in the twelve-person spa for a soothing soak.

Folding glass doors create a seamless flow of space between the terrace and interior. The fabulous open kitchen boasts chef-grade appliances and an extensive bar area, including a lovely island for cocktails or casual meals. Beside the kitchen is a comfortable TV lounge, while a separate living room welcomes toasty evenings by the fire. The dining room seats ten amid exquisite artwork and garden views. Throughout the home, luminous white surfaces accentuate the dreamy natural light and gallery-quality art collection, which balances modernist and Buddhist traditions. The villa is fully air-conditioned and includes a fitness room.

The six bedrooms include five with king beds and one with a queen, while a Murphy bed in the office can accommodate additional guests. Five of the rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and three open to balconies. The spacious master suite boasts an open-concept balcony with a lounge and stand-alone tub overlooking the pool.

Nestled on a private cul-de-sac neighboring Balboa Park, the villa possesses an almost rural serenity near the heart of San Diego. The park features 1,200 acres of gardens, trails, and family-friendly attractions including San Diego Zoo. Myriad other activities and destinations are within a short drive of the villa, including Seaport Village and Coronado Golf Course. Proximity to San Diego International Airport ensures easy arrival for wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Resonating in complete harmony with its natural surroundings, Northside is a spacious, welcoming ski home in the exclusive Empire Pass community of Deer Valley. Five bedrooms and seven bathrooms make Northside the perfect vacation home for large groups and families. Add the private hot tub, ski-in/ski out access to the slopes and home theater, and this is shaping up to be your ideal mountain retreat.

Spend social evenings in the mountain air, gathering in your private outdoor hot tub for chilled out drinks. Create dream vacation moments and wonderful memories under the starry Utah sky. Inside you have a super games room, complete with retro arcade machine. A games console is accompanied by a terrific big screen and cushy giant beanbags. Or congregate on the gorgeous u-shaped leather couch in Northside’s home theater for a laid-back movie night.

The lounge is lovingly scattered with an eclectic mix of comfy armchairs and couches. Light a fire, put on your favorite tunes and gather here after an eventful day on the mountain. Fabulous views over the treetops give this space an even more magical feeling. Spacious and exceedingly well-equipped, the kitchen is an open, social and practical area while the dining area sits on its own polished platform and is prettily lit for a lovely evening meal ambiance. An extra reception room becomes whatever you want it to - a quiet spot to hide away with a book, a study for researching fun activities in Deer Valley or even an exercise room.

Mountain views and traditional stone fireplaces make the two sumptuous king size rooms extra special. Enjoy views of the great outdoors, snug under your plush comforter. En-suites with jetted tubs complete the luxury experience. The twin is incredibly cozy, and houses a magnificent antique style wardrobe for all your vacation outfits. Like all the bedrooms, the superb queen also has an en-suite and a television. Charming alpine inspired bunk-beds call the fifth bedroom home, gifting plenty of sleeping space.

Northside’s ideal ski-in/ski-out location is helpful in the mornings and absolute bliss at the end of a day on the mountain. Ski or board to your heart’s content on the perfectly groomed runs of Flagstaff Mountain. The Utah Olympic Park is nearby where you can experience the exhilarating thrill of the 2002 Olympic bobsleigh track. Take the dial-a-ride shuttle bus to Park City for shops, restaurants and entertainment.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spacious Reunion mansion delivers exceptional style, top facilities and special touches that kids will love. The home’s large pool is ringed by sun recliners and palm trees, with the interior dining room a study in shining glass table and tasteful decor. Movie-themed bedrooms and game tables will be a hit, with luxury resort amenities, Disney World and the greater Orlando area minutes away.

Being so close to America’s entertainment dreamland at Disney World, kids will be happy to find their rooms reflect similar magic, with enthusiastic decor bringing bedrooms to life. The commitment to entertainment continues with the home’s games room, with a pool, ping-pong and TV set-up ensuring that guests can relax in style at any time of the day. Outdoor seating, complete with overhead fans, make for an ideal social gathering spot on balmy afternoons and evenings, especially with a drink in hand courtesy of the villa’s full wet bar. 

Guests can easily access the full range of excellent Reunion resort facilities from this home. This includes a range of day spas, renowned restaurants and cocktail bars. Just a short drive away, guests can soak up the magical atmosphere, daily parades and renowned rides at both Disney World and Universal Studios. A range of diverse day outings are available in the locality, ranging from visits to wildlife sanctuaries, to Florida wineries, and highly-regarded museums. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Cypress trees, stone walls and arched loggias bring a little bit of Tuscany to the Texas hills at this Italian-inspired estate outside Austin. While the architecture takes its inspiration from traditional countryside villas, the amenities are state of the art, from a movie theater to a private gym with a sauna. It’s 10 miles to the galleries, museums, music venues, boutiques, and bars downtown. 

Arches and columns frame the 180-degree views over the villa’s infinity pool, hot tub, and a sunny terrace dotted with loungers. A shaded area houses the alfresco living and dining areas, a barbecue, and an outdoor fireplace, and a lower-level patio has a firepit. Take a quiet moment in the sauna and massage chair, have a movie night with friends and family in the home theater, and test your skill at the pool table. 

The same style of arches, hung with lanterns, usher you into the hallway connecting the living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen of this vacation rental. High ceilings and stone floors give the spaces a cool airiness on the hottest days, and floor-length drapes and wrought-iron chandeliers give a sense of rustic chic. 

There are 4 bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and 1 in a separate casita; all 5 have ensuite bathrooms. The main house has 1 bedroom with a king bed and 3 bedrooms with queen beds. The casita has a queen bed and 2 twin bunk beds as well as a kitchenette, and could be used by a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy or parents traveling with younger children. 

The villa is 10 miles from downtown Austin, where you can catch a live concert, stop by a bungalow transformed into a bar, have dinner at a restaurant in a former warehouse, and find a one-of-a-kind souvenir of your holiday. It’s just under 7 miles from Zilker Metropolitan Park, home to the 3-acre natural-wonder Barton Springs Pool. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Mountain views, freshly groomed trails and a cozy fireside are all waiting at Farwell Mountain 607. This beautiful vacation rental at One Steamboat Place puts you close to the best of Steamboat Springs, from skiing to golf to the area’s namesake hot springs. Bring up to ten friends or family members to enjoy the resort amenities, open-plan living area and four suite-style bedrooms.

One Steamboat Place provides a luxury setting for your ski holiday, golf getaway or outdoor adventure. Guests of the community are welcome at the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room and wine tasting room. Take the winter shuttle service, which makes it easy to travel as a group, or let the kids play in the Little Tykes room while the grown-ups book a spa appointment. Whether you’ve spent the day chasing thrills or relaxing, make it a laid-back evening with a barbecue on the villa’s private balcony or a glass of wine in front of the flat-screen television and fireplace.

The large, open-plan great room at Farwell Mountain 607 means no one feels left out of the fun. There’s a sitting area laid out around the television and fireplace, and a dining area where all ten of you can toast to a beginner’s first run down the bunny slope or just the fact that you’re all together. A breakfast bar provides additional seating and lets you chat to the cook while they work in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

The villa’s four bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, offer flexible accommodations for a variety of groups. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own gas fireplace. The other two bedrooms each have twin-over-double bunk beds.

Though Steamboat Springs has some of the best skiing in Colorado—and the villa is just a 5-minute walk from Steamboat Ski Resort—there’s plenty more to do besides cruise down the slopes. In the summer, you’re less than 2 miles from the scenic fairways of the Rollingstone Ranch golf course. No matter what the season, it’s worth visiting the nearby hot springs for a family-friendly splash at Old Town or a honeymoon-style soak and stargaze at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Whether you’re in town for business and looking for a weekly rental or making a romantic getaway and need a house to escape to, Sanctuary in the Hills is a private oasis in the city. Tucked on a side street near Coldwater Canyon in Beverly Hills, this luxury vacation rental has a secluded outdoor space and canyon views, but is still close to shopping, dining, nightlife and more. The magazine-worthy, recently renovated interiors and four suite-style bedrooms pair modern French style with South African artwork to chic, memorable effect.

Owned by a Hollywood event producer, the villa is well appointed to accommodate entertaining or private moments. Like a secret garden, a terrace made from reclaimed, century-old bricks is tucked behind the house, overlooking the canyon. Put your favorite music on the outdoor speakers and soak in the California sun from the lounge chairs, break for a swim in the pool, and fire up the barbecue before settling in to the al-fresco dining area. On cooler evenings, move indoors and have a drink from the wet bar or wine fridge or relax in front of the Apple TV. If you need to stay connected, the house has an office space and Wi-Fi.

Sanctuary in the Hills combines the sprawling layout of a bungalow with the refinement of a mansion. Taking inspiration from the French modern aesthetic, Mediterranean style and the artwork of the owner’s native South Africa, the property feels at once contemporary and classic. The open-plan living spaces are unified by distressed Kentucky French oak floors, whitewashed ceiling beams and cool white walls, and wide windows that fill the rooms with light. A comfortable sitting area boasts cream-colored sofas and built-in bookcases, a thoughtful touch that’s echoed by the built-in banquette in the dining area. The fully equipped kitchen has both a practical breakfast bar and an on-trend monochromatic white look.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite, which opens directly onto the pool terrace, has a king bed and walk-in closet. The other three bedrooms, one of which opens to the pool terrace as well, have queen beds. The same oak flooring and white walls create a serene feel in the bedrooms, while intricate tiles and unusual mirrors add interest to the spa-worthy bathrooms.

Though this Beverly Hills villa feels miles away from the ordinary, it’s a short drive to downtown, West Hollywood and more. Treat yourself to shopping on Rodeo Drive, about 4 miles away, or The Grove, about 6 miles away, or experience the famed nightlife along the Sunset Strip, just over 4 miles away, and Hollywood Boulevard, 6.5 miles away. If you’re traveling with kids, take them to Universal Studios, about 6 miles away, or for a day on Santa Monica Beach or Venice Beach, about 13 and 14 miles away, respectively. The closest airport to Sanctuary in the Hills is Los Angeles International, a 16-mile drive from the villa.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Registration number: HSR19-003045

listing.listing_description:
Get double the views from One Steamboat Place at Diamond Peak Penthouse 616. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental looks out over both the breathtaking Yampa Valley and the base of Steamboat Ski Resort. With a slopeside location, ski-in, ski-out access and open-plan interiors designed for entertaining, the villa is perfect for a family reunion or a winter getaway with friends.

Penthouse guests are welcome to use the shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room and other amenities at the exclusive One Steamboat Place community. Host a cookout on the villa’s private deck, which has a built-in barbecue, or serve refreshments from the wine cooler while gathering around the fireplace and flat-screen television for an easy night in.

Diamond Peak Penthouse 616 is laid out around an open-plan great room with a sitting area, dining for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Thoughtful touches like a stone fireplace surround and window seat lend a rustic, cozy feel, while original artwork selected by the villa’s owner adds pops of color.

Invite up to twelve friends or family to Colorado for a comfortable holiday in the penthouse’s four bedrooms. There are two master suites with king beds, one room with two double beds, and one room with two bunk beds where kids will want to stake out their own space. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

With the gondola just an elevator ride away, access to the ski slopes from Diamond Peak Penthouse 616 is unrivaled. And complimentary shuttle service during the ski season makes it even easier to get around. In the summer, however, it’s still only a short drive to local attractions like the scenic fairways of Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course, the family-friendly pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town and the honeymoon-worthy natural rock formations and mineral waters at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Book the ultimate ski-in, ski-out holiday at Beaver Mountain 411. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, an exclusive community at the base of the gondola. Enjoy easy access to the slopes during the day, and gorgeous open-plan living spaces in the evenings.

Guests of Beaver Mountain 411 are welcome to use the community’s shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room and other beautifully appointed spaces. For private entertaining, the villa has its own furnished deck with a barbecue, as well as a fireplace, flat-screen television, wine cooler and Wi-Fi.

After a day on the slopes, the villa’s open-plan great room is a warm, welcome respite. Cozy up to the fireplace and television on the roomy sectional or leather armchairs, prepare a well-deserved feast using the professional-grade appliances in the fully equipped kitchen, and settle in to enjoy around a dining table that seats ten. As the sun sets, you can watch the lights go on in the Yampa Valley below through the glass doors to the deck.

Four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family on a Colorado adventure. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. The fourth bedroom has two double beds and a shared hall bath, and is perfect for older kids who want their own space.

Each morning, put on your ski boots in the villa and make the 1-minute walk to the gondola at Steamboat Ski Resort. In the winter, One Steamboat Place provides complimentary shuttle service; in the summer, you’ll hardly need the shuttle to make the short drive to local attractions like the Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club. If you need a break from skiing, hiking, biking or other outdoor activities, treat yourself to a family-friendly day out at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy soak in the mineral waters of Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Design lovers and entertainers will find their dream getaway in the Hollywood Hills at LA Outpost. This contemporary vacation rental commands bird’s-eye views of the city from its hilltop perch and boasts Instagram-worthy interiors filled with mid-century gems. Reserve its three bedrooms for a city break with friends, a quiet holiday with family or even a stylish California honeymoon.

Bask in the sunshine or watch the city lights come on from outdoor living areas with a firepit and Japanese-style soaking tub. Inside, you’ll find a cable television and Wi-Fi, as well as a gas fireplace, a wine cellar and a loft-inspired office that’s a private space to catch up on emails or share photos of your stay.

LA Outpost is laid out around an open-concept great room with a collection of furniture from some of the biggest names in Scandinavian mid-century design, from Poul Kjaerholm and Niels O. Moller to Piet Hein and Bengt Ruda. The home also features art curated by Tappan Collective and bedding by Parachute. Savor the pieces in the two sitting areas, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, or take them home; all furniture, objects, art and accessories can be purchased.

This luxury property has one bedroom with a king bed and balcony, and two bedrooms with queen beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same thoughtful furnishings and details as the rest of the house, from geometric area rugs to vibrant artwork.

Though the villa’s hilltop setting makes it feel far away from it all, it’s less than 5 miles to top attractions such as the shopping and entertainment mecca The Grove, the Hollywood Bowl and Universal Studios. Just a bit farther, the Getty Center, Los Angeles Zoo and Griffith Observatory are all less than a 10-mile drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Have some Texas-sized fun at this waterfront villa along the shores of Lake Austin. Superbly equipped with family-friendly games, foodie-friendly appliances, and a fabulous outdoor entertainment area, this vacation rental has everything you need for a memorable reunion or inspiring retreat. Hiking, swimming, golf, and the world-class live music and eateries of Austin are an easy drive away.

The villa inspires open-air, riverfront delights with plentiful options for relaxation, dining, and festivities. Next to the private dock is a glass-enclosed boathouse with ping-pong table, as well as a sundeck with loungers overlooking the water. The ample terrace features a pool, hot tub, sun loungers, and fire pit, while the bocce court below has trellised lighting for nighttime tournaments. A full kitchen with barbecue, fireplace, wet bar, and plentiful seating commands the scene.

Inside, a lounge and pool table are perched between the open gourmet kitchen and terrace, creating a lovely social scene while dinner is cooking. Multiple lounge areas allow the cocktail party to spread itself out, while the large TV is perfect for family movie night. There is also an office for business travelers or students, and a sauna for working up a sweat before a moonlit dip.

Family-friendly accommodations include a charming kids' bunkroom plus 5 adult-friendly bedrooms: 3 with king beds, 2 with queens. One of the queen rooms enjoys a private entrance, lounge, and kitchenette. The master opens directly to the pool and includes a private living area and spacious bathroom with soaking tub.

Perched above the Lake Austin portion of the Colorado River, this villa places you in the lush heart of Texas Hill Country, with a plethora of parks, swimming holes, and hiking trails within 5 or 10 miles of your door. When it's time to explore the Live Music Capital of the World, you're just 9 miles from Zilker Park and 13 from Downtown Austin.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Buffalo Pass Residence, within the exclusive One Steamboat Place complex, offers luxurious privacy and classy mountain charm just a minute’s walk from the Steamboat slopes. In this beautifully designed, four-bedroom vacation rental, you’ll have the ideal home base to enjoy downtime with family friends between long days in the alpine air.

From your suite's open plan living area, large windows look out at the valley and fill the interior with warm mountain light. The large, comfy sectional couch surrounds the wood-burning fire place and, beside it, flat screen television, making it the perfect lounge for family gathering and relaxation. The suite's rich wooden floors, beautiful rugs, warm and earthy color palette, and tasteful décor evoke classic Rocky Mountain and Southwest charm. The large, fully equipped kitchen features Viking Appliances, richly hued wood cabinetry, and a gorgeous island breakfast bar for four. There is also a work desk with iMac computer beside the living lounge. Heating and air conditioning will keep you comfortable in any season, and sliding glass doors open from the living area to the balcony, with barbeque and lounge furniture.

The ample, cozy bedrooms will make you feel right at home, with their luxurious beds, soft carpeting, lovely natural light, and flat screen televisions for bedtime viewing. The master bedroom features king size bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and stand-alone bath. There is also a second bedroom with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub; a room with two double beds and access to the hall bathroom; and a room with two twin-over-double beds with ensuite bathroom—perfect for kids. The bedrooms are ideal for getting a deep night's rest before another awesome day on the slopes or trails.

Buffalo Pass Residence guests have shared access to the heated outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, should those tried and tested muscles need a nice, restorative soak. When it's time to hit the slopes, you're a one-minute walk from Steamboat Gondola. City Market is just over a mile away, and Steamboat Old Town just three miles. After the thaw, dust off your woods and irons and head to the Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, less than two miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hit the slopes of Breckenridge, Copper Mountain, and Keystone bright and early at this updated ski lodge in the prestigious Highlands neighborhood. Kick your boots off and warm yourself by the fire after a long day of skiing. Take relaxation to the next level and step outside to the hot tub. After you've rejuvenated, make your way 6 miles downtown for dinner and drinks at Breckenridge Brewery.

Pull a leather stool up to the kitchen's granite breakfast bar and sip your morning espresso while planning out the day. Wander the hardwood floors, imposing timber features, and intricate stonework to find the perfect place to enjoy the mountain view before heading out. On your way home, pick up something fresh from the local market to barbecue and enjoy an unforgettable family meal in the 10 seat dining room.

After dinner, let your inner mixologist run wild at the wet bar and stir-up a few classic cocktails to sip while you watch the big game in the living room. If you're up to the task, build a fire outside and see who can craft the perfect s' more. Before bed, melt any leftover stress away in the master ensuite's spa-like soaking tub. Then, retire to the 4-post bed to recharge your batteries for another exciting day.

Need a break from skiing? Enjoy the snow, landscapes, and beers of Breckenridge with a fat bike brewery tour from Ridden. Visit all of Breckenridge's finest craft breweries while getting a little exercise on a bike outfitted for snowy trails. In the summer months, the Alpine Slide and Goldrunner Coaster are exciting alternatives to skiing, and fun for the whole family.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: For guests traveling in the warmer months, please note that air conditioning is not available at this property.

listing.listing_description:
Experience contemporary California living at Trousdale Resort. This vacation rental makes it easy to live like a local in Los Angeles, with West Coast cool interiors, sun-splashed outdoor living areas and a location just minutes from the best of Beverly Hills. It’s a stylish destination for a holiday with family or a city getaway with friends.

Take in panoramic views of L.A. from a private backyard with a swimming pool, hot tub, and a terrace with an outdoor living room, al-fresco shower and barbecue. After sunset, you can watch the lights come on along the skyline or enjoy the villa’s satellite TV, wet bar, gas fireplace and Wi-Fi. There’s also an exercise room so you can keep up with your routine.

The villa’s 7,000 square feet of space are a dramatic study in modern style, with striking architecture and luxury furnishings. The central open-concept great room features a living area, dining area and fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen framed by stone floors and walnut ceilings. The room ends in a glass wall that can be slid back to open the space to the terrace.

Trousdale Resort has one master bedroom with a king bed, terrace and direct access to the pool, and three bedrooms with queen beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same luxe touches as the rest of this contemporary oasis.

From the villa’s tucked-away location in the coveted Trousdale neighborhood, it’s less than a 5-mile drive to shopping on Rodeo Drive, entertainment at The Grove, hikes in Runyon Canyon Park and the collection at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art. Bring the kids for a day out at Universal Studios or a nearby beach, or relive your honeymoon with a grown-ups-only evening in one of Hollywood’s restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find a picture-perfect retreat in the heart of Sun Valley at Eagle Lake Estate. Tucked onto a lakeside lot in the shadow of the Idaho mountains, this charming vacation rental boasts gorgeous views, magazine-worthy interiors and luxury accommodations for parties of up to twelve. Even better, it’s less than 10 minutes from the nearest ski slope and the downtown area of Ketchum.

Take in the views from a terrace with an al-fresco dining area, a barbecue and a hot tub, or stroll the manicured grounds and listen to the birds singing in the trees. If you’ve been out in the mountains all day, unwind with the help of the villa’s Apple TV, surround-sound system, Wi-Fi, wet bar and gas fireplace. For your comfort, there’s also heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities.

Eagle Lake Estate pairs the rustic appeal of mountain lodges with the romance of European estates throughout its more than 7,000 square feet of space. At its heart is a two-story great room with living and dining areas; step through a doorway and into a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and nook. Luxe details like plush fabrics, a stone fireplace surround and framed Hermes scarves give the spaces a certain sophistication.

The estate has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including one that opens to the hot tub and one with a private balcony, and two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms. The fifth bedroom is perfect for a family on holiday together, with two twin bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.

No matter what your activity of choice, you’ll find year-round excitement close to Eagle Lake Estate. Its Hailey location puts you close to biking and cross-country ski trails, scenic hiking, great fly fishing spots and downhill skiing at Sun Valley. If shopping and dining are more your thing, make the short drive into Ketchum for a look at its galleries or a honeymoon-worthy dinner.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rethink what a ski holiday can be at Caldera Pacana. This thoughtfully designed Jackson Hole vacation rental is part of Caldera House, a luxury boutique hotel that offers the comforts of a private home—and a contemporary twist on the traditional mountain chalet. Its four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight friends or a group of extended family in the heart of Teton Village.

After a day out in the mountains, relax on a balcony featuring a hot tub, barbecue, al-fresco dining for six and a firepit, or entertain indoors with the help of the media room, Apple TV, sound system, Wi-Fi, fireplace and wine fridge. Guests are also welcome to use the shared fitness center, sauna and heated outdoor pool at Caldera House.

Wyoming-based architects and designers Carney Logan Burke chose custom walnut millwork, sleek furnishings and a pale stone fireplace surround to give the great room a sophisticated look. There’s room for everyone to gather in the open-concept space, whether in the living area, around the dining table or in the fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Caldera Pacana has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own fireplace and balcony, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds that’s perfect for younger guests. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

The slopeside location of Caldera House gives guests ski-in access from Jackson Hole Resort. It’s also just a 1-minute walk from the villa to the resort’s aerial tram, and a 2-minute walk to shopping and dining in the center of Teton Village. It’s a short drive to the nearest golf course, a selection of local specialties at Aspens Market and the town of Jackson. While you’re out west, don’t miss the chance to visit Grand Teton National Park or Yellowstone National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Walk-in Closet, Television

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy a private retreat in the center of the action at Parkite on Main. Though it’s set above the bustling shops and restaurants of downtown Park City, just minutes from the Town Lift ski lift, this contemporary vacation rental is a quiet haven of modern luxury. With more than 1,400 square feet and two bedrooms, the villa has room for eight, but can also be reserved for a honeymoon-style getaway just for two.

Guests of Parkite on Main have access to an underground parking space, plus a shared rooftop terrace, fitness room and ski storage area. The villa also has its own Apple TV, integrated sound system, Wi-Fi, gas fireplace and wine cooler, making it easy to relax in private after a day of sightseeing or skiing.

Look out over Main Street from a bright open-plan great room with a huge window facing the neighboring historic buildings. The sitting area gets a cozy feel from a white brick fireplace, and the mid-century-inspired dining table seats six. State-of-the-art appliances, gorgeous granite countertops and a breakfast bar distinguish the fully equipped kitchen.

Parkite on Main has a master bedroom with a king bed and its own fireplace, and a second bedroom with two queen beds. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and pale wood paneling and neutral tones give them a sleek yet serene vibe.

Whether you’ve come on a couples holiday or have brought the whole family to Utah, you’ll find plenty around the villa to entertain. It’s less than a 10-minute walk to the Town Lift chairlift at Park City Mountain Resort and the popular Park Silly Sunday Market, and less than a 10-minute drive to the bases of two ski resorts, plus local entertainment venues. If you’ll be visiting during the summer, you’ll find the nearest golf course a 10-minute drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Distant peaks unfurl beneath endless skies just outside the windows of 2997 Deer Crest. Set in the exclusive Deer Crest gated community, this world-class luxury residence affords panoramic vistas over the Utah landscape from its 9,000 square feet of living space. But it’s not just about pretty views; it’s set along a private-access ski trail leading to the Jordanelle gondola at Deer Valley.

In warmer weather, guests can admire the views from furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub and barbecue. During ski season, leave gear in the storage area and stretch out in the exercise room, ensconce yourself in the sauna, serve refreshments from the wet bar over a movie in the home theater or challenge friends and family in the games room.

The estate’s double-height entry and great room show off a sleek, modern take on mountain style, while floor-to-ceiling windows showcase the views. Stone fireplaces anchor the sitting area and a cozy breakfast nook, and jewel-toned fabrics add to the warm, inviting feel. For special occasions, gather around the formal dining table; for more casual meals, gather at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

This expansive vacation rental has four bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and mountain views, and two bunk rooms perfect for kids. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace and balcony, and one bedroom with two queen beds. The bunk rooms have two double bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom, and three double bunk beds and a hall bathroom, respectively.

2997 Deer Crest is less than a 10-minute drive from the base of the Deer Valley ski resort and a 10-minute drive from Park City Golf Course, putting you close to outdoor activities no matter what time of year your holiday is. It’s also just 10 minutes by car from Park City’s charming Main Street, where you’ll find everything from the perfect souvenir to honeymoon-worthy dinners at trendy restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pines, hills, and sea peek into every room through the oversized windows of this lodge-meets-contemporary villa. Set amid a quintessential Carmel-by-the-Sea landscape—think curving branches framing rugged headlands and peaceful bays—the home has the pitched roof of a chalet and the glass walls of a modernist retreat. Drive 5 minutes or walk into town to shop boutiques in cottage-like buildings. 

On sunny California days, outdoor living spaces with sitting and dining areas, plenty of loungers, and a gas barbecue beckon. On cooler evenings, watch the stars come out from around the firepit or cozy up to the gas fireplace inside as you watch a show on the smart TV and share holiday photos over Wi-Fi. 

While this luxury property is newly built, its design draws inspiration from decades of mountain lodges and mid-century style. A partial wall of glass and cathedral ceiling flood the living room with light, and oversized artwork draws the eye to the fireplace. The layout flows into a dining area in a glassed-in corner, and from there, into a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. 

There are 2 bedrooms in the main house of this vacation rental and 1 in a guest house across the courtyard; all 3 have ensuite bathrooms. The main-house bedrooms have a king bed and 2 double beds, respectively. The guest house, with its 2 double beds, is ideal for a family traveling with younger children, in-laws, or a couple hoping to relive their honeymoon in private. 

The villa is a 5-minute drive from downtown Carmel-by-the-Sea, with everything from clothing shops to jewelers to antiques, and Monastery Beach, a wonderful spot for walking (but not safe for swimming). Tee off at Pebble Beach and the Spyglass Hill Golf Course, or take a day trip to explore sights in Monterey, such as Cannery Row and the Monterey Bay Aquarium. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
